name: Via Ferrata Cala del Moli
description:
This easy via ferrata is more for tourists or others not particularly experienced, or possibly if you are tired from jetlag and want something straightforward to do somewhat near Barcelona (1h15m away). It is built right above the ocean but never gets more than about 50' above the water. It is generally quite busy with people, even starting at 7:45am on a Thursday it had large groups with kids on it already. It is built with high quality stainless steel components, and has good pacing, introducing you to progressively longer bridges and climbs but never gets difficult. It took me 45 min car-to-car and that was waiting and passing at least 5 groups of people on the route.
